data.title: Best Movies Like The Magnificent Ambersons
meta_keywords: movies similar to The Magnificent Ambersons
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The Magnificent Ambersons: Three Sisters (1970), Sons & Lovers (2003), Stella (1990), Illusion (2004), Ethan Frome (1992), Nailed (2001), Bridge to Silence (1989), Treading Water (2001), Scarlett (1994), Twice in a Lifetime (1985)

Genre: Drama, Romance

Story: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry George's father.
